report.title: reportHolds
report.sql: select biblio.bibid ,biblio_copy.barcode_nmbr ,biblio.title ,biblio.author ,biblio_hold.hold_begin_dt ,member.mbrid ,member.barcode_nmbr ,member.last_name ,member.first_name ,member.home_phone ,member.work_phone ,member.email from biblio, biblio_copy, biblio_hold, member where biblio.bibid = biblio_copy.bibid and biblio.bibid = biblio_hold.bibid and biblio_copy.copyid = biblio_hold.copyid and biblio_hold.mbrid = member.mbrid
